typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description: This object contains annotation for the answers. It will contains the floowing fields: begin (int): where the annotation begins end (int): where the annotation ends IsCorrect (boolean): if the answer is correct ComponentID (string): The name of the component which produced this annotation object Confidence (float): Confidence value assigned by the component which produced this object

featureDescription.name: IsCorrect
featureDescription.description: Stores boolean for: Is this answer correct?

featureDescription.name: ComponentID
featureDescription.description: Contains the name of the component which created this annotation.

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: Contains a float value between 0 and 1 which describes the confidence of the component.

typeDescription.name: Question
typeDescription.description: This information object annotates the question present in the input file. Apart from the inherited elements like begin and end, it also contains: -> ComponentID: tells the name of the component that produced it. -> Confidence: float value in (0,1) depicts the confidence of Component that produced it.

featureDescription.name: ComponentID
featureDescription.description: Name of the component that created this annotation

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence that Component ID had for this annotation

typeDescription.name: AnswerScore
typeDescription.description: Annotates the scores for each answer. Apart from the inherited elements like begin and end, it also contains: -> ComponentID: name of the component that created the annotation -> Confidence: Confidence ComponentID had in the annotation. -> Score: float in (0,1) which tells how likely this answer is an answer to the question. -> Answer: The actual answer that is being evaluated.

featureDescription.name: ComponentID
featureDescription.description: Name of the component which produced this annotation

featureDescription.name: Confidence
featureDescription.description: Confidence that the annotator had in this annotation

featureDescription.name: Score
featureDescription.description: The score which depicts how likely is this answer going to answer the question

featureDescription.name: Answer
featureDescription.description: The Answer for which the score if being generated
